title: Black Screen upon opening LOL Patcher
body: I just installed LOL onto my windows desktop and the patcher screen goes black right after it clearly shows the loading (L) icon. Any particular reason why? Please help I need my LOL fix!

replies.body:
If you try and start up the patcher and all it shows you is a black screen, there's a good chance that your network is having some issues connecting to our game servers. When you have an unstable connection, the patcher isn't able to grab the data from our servers so all it shows is a black screen. Let's follow the [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if we can get you set up with a more stable connection.

Let me know if you have any questions!

Alright so I downloaded the hextech repair tool and I tried running it with the "force patch" box checked and then "chromium embedded framework client application has stopped working" popped up. Any suggestion?

Try closing out of any other programs that might still be running when you try using the Hextech Repair Tool. Also, be sure that you're running it from the installation folder (should be something like C:\Program Files (x86)\Hextech Repair Tool). 

Sometimes other processes can interfere with it's scanning and cause it to throw this error.
